general: Members must book classes online or via phone.
Arrive at least 15 minutes early, especially if it's your first time.
Late entries are not allowed once the class begins.
If you don't check in at least 5 minutes before class, your spot may be given away.
waitlist: Automatic booking if a spot opens before 6 PM the day before.
After 6 PM, first-come, first-served via email.
